channel.title: ::addobject command

item.title: ::addobject command
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

if (command.startsWith("object")) { try { int object = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12)); int orient = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13,14)); int type = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(15)); AddGlobalObj(absX, absY, object, orient, type); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Use as ::object #####, #, ##"); } }

That works.

item.title: ::addobject command
item.dc:creator: @k0_Doom k0 Doom
item.description:
@k0_Doom wrote:

can som1 test this command plz
im trying to add it to my server but it wont work

if (command.startsWith("addobject") && playerRights >= 3) { try { int objID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12,16)); int objType = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(17,19)); int objFace = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(20)); if (objID >= 0) { AddGlobalObject(absX, absY, objID, objFace, objType); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::addobject 0823 10 0 for global objects,"); sendMessage("or ::addobject 1631 0 0 for wall objects."); sendMessage("::addobject [ObjectID] [ObjectType] [ObjectFace]"); } }

Read full topic
